title: My Daddy, the Doctor
description: Doctor's Orders is a short erotic story (10K words).When Piper Wilson learns her older, attractive doctor has booked a booty call with a prostitute, she takes matters into her own hands and makes an appointment for seduction.This short story is intended for readers 18 years and older. It contains sexual material not intended for a younger audience and all characters are assumed to be over the age of 18, consenting adults, and not related by blood. This is a work of erotic fiction.
author: Claire Collier
